This file is a merged representation of the entire codebase, combined into a single document by Repomix.

================================================================
File Summary
================================================================

Purpose:
--------
This file contains a packed representation of the entire repository's contents.
It is designed to be easily consumable by AI systems for analysis, code review,
or other automated processes.

File Format:
------------
The content is organized as follows:
1. This summary section
2. Repository information
3. Directory structure
4. Multiple file entries, each consisting of:
  a. A separator line (================)
  b. The file path (File: path/to/file)
  c. Another separator line
  d. The full contents of the file
  e. A blank line

Usage Guidelines:
-----------------
- This file should be treated as read-only. Any changes should be made to the
  original repository files, not this packed version.
- When processing this file, use the file path to distinguish
  between different files in the repository.
- Be aware that this file may contain sensitive information. Handle it with
  the same level of security as you would the original repository.

Notes:
------
- Some files may have been excluded based on .gitignore rules and Repomix's configuration
- Binary files are not included in this packed representation. Please refer to the Repository Structure section for a complete list of file paths, including binary files
- Files matching patterns in .gitignore are excluded
- Files matching default ignore patterns are excluded

Additional Info:
----------------

================================================================
Directory Structure
================================================================
public/
  vite.svg
src/
  assets/
    react.svg
  components/
    decorative/
      index.jsx
    AcceptedView.jsx
    AudioController.jsx
  constants/
    index.js
  animations.css
  App.css
  App.jsx
  index.css
  main.jsx
  repomix-output.txt
  ValentineProposal.jsx
.gitignore
eslint.config.js
index.html
package.json
README.md
vite.config.js

================
File: src/components/decorative/index.jsx
================
import React from 'react';
import { Heart, PartyPopper, Stars } from 'lucide-react';

export const FloatingHeart = ({ style, size = 24, color = 'text-red-300' }) => (
  <div className='absolute animate-float' style={style}>
    <Heart size={size} className={`${color} opacity-50`} />
  </div>
);

export const Confetti = ({ style }) => (
  <div className='absolute animate-confetti' style={style}>
    <PartyPopper size={20} className='text-pink-400' />
  </div>
);

export const Sparkle = ({ style }) => (
  <div className='absolute animate-sparkle' style={style}>
    <Stars size={16} className='text-yellow-400' />
  </div>
);

================
File: src/components/AcceptedView.jsx
================
import React from 'react';
import { Heart, Sparkles, Volume2, VolumeX } from 'lucide-react';
import { FloatingHeart, Confetti, Sparkle } from './decorative';
import { LDR_QUOTES } from '../constants';
import AudioController from './AudioController';

const AcceptedView = ({ hearts, confetti, sparkles, isMuted, setIsMuted }) => {
  return (
    <div className='fixed inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center bg-pink-50 overflow-hidden'>
      {/* Keep audio controller in accepted view */}
      <AudioController hoverCount={0} isAccepted={true} isMuted={isMuted} />

      {/* Sound control button */}
      <button
        onClick={() => setIsMuted(!isMuted)}
        className='fixed top-4 right-4 p-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white/80 transition-colors z-50'
      >
        {isMuted ? <VolumeX className='text-gray-600 h-6 w-6' /> : <Volume2 className='text-gray-600 h-6 w-6' />}
      </button>

      {/* Background decorations */}
      {hearts.map(heart => (
        <FloatingHeart
          key={heart.id}
          style={{
            left: heart.left,
            top: heart.top,
            animationDelay: heart.animationDelay,
          }}
          size={heart.size}
        />
      ))}
      {confetti.map(conf => (
        <Confetti
          key={conf.id}
          style={{
            left: conf.left,
            top: conf.top,
            animationDelay: conf.animationDelay,
            animationDuration: conf.animationDuration,
          }}
        />
      ))}
      {sparkles.map(sparkle => (
        <Sparkle
          key={sparkle.id}
          style={{
            left: sparkle.left,
            top: sparkle.top,
            animationDelay: sparkle.animationDelay,
            animationDuration: sparkle.animationDuration,
          }}
        />
      ))}

      {/* Central content */}
      <div className='relative'>
        <Heart className='text-red-500 animate-heartbeat' size={96} />
        <Sparkles className='absolute -top-6 -right-6 text-yellow-400 animate-spin-slow' size={32} />
        <Sparkles className='absolute -bottom-6 -left-6 text-yellow-400 animate-spin-slow' size={32} />
      </div>

      <h1 className='text-6xl font-bold text-red-500 text-center animate-celebration mt-8 mb-12'>
        Yay! Happy Valentine's Day! ‚ù§Ô∏è
      </h1>

      <div className='max-w-3xl mx-auto p-4 grid gap-4'>
        {LDR_QUOTES.map((quote, index) => (
          <div
            key={index}
            className='text-xl text-gray-700 italic text-center p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg border-2 border-pink-200 
              transform hover:-translate-y-2 transition-all duration-300
              animate-fadeInSlide'
            style={{ animationDelay: `${index * 0.2}s` }}
          >
            <span className='inline-block animate-pulse-slow'>‚ù§Ô∏è</span>
            <span className='mx-2'>"{quote}"</span>
            <span className='inline-block animate-pulse-slow'>‚ù§Ô∏è</span>
          </div>
        ))}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default AcceptedView;

================
File: src/components/AudioController.jsx
================
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';

const AudioController = ({ hoverCount, isAccepted }) => {
  const initialMusicRef = useRef(null);
  const acceptedMusicRef = useRef(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    // Create audio elements
    initialMusicRef.current = new Audio('HONNE - Location Unknown  (feat. BEKA) (Brooklyn Session).mp3');
    acceptedMusicRef.current = new Audio(
      'Skip to Loafer („Çπ„Ç≠„ÉÉ„Éó„Å®„É≠„Éº„Éï„Ç°„Éº)(Opening)  Keina Suda - Mellow („É°„É≠„Ç¶) LyricsKanRomEng).mp3'
    );

    // Set initial music to loop
    initialMusicRef.current.loop = true;
    // Start with lower volume
    initialMusicRef.current.volume = 0.5;

    // Clean up
    return () => {
      if (initialMusicRef.current) {
        initialMusicRef.current.pause();
        initialMusicRef.current = null;
      }
      if (acceptedMusicRef.current) {
        acceptedMusicRef.current.pause();
        acceptedMusicRef.current = null;
      }
    };
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (isAccepted) {
      // Fade out initial music
      const fadeOut = setInterval(() => {
        if (initialMusicRef.current && initialMusicRef.current.volume > 0.1) {
          initialMusicRef.current.volume -= 0.1;
        } else {
          clearInterval(fadeOut);
          if (initialMusicRef.current) {
            initialMusicRef.current.pause();
          }
          // Start accepted music
          if (acceptedMusicRef.current) {
            acceptedMusicRef.current.play();
          }
        }
      }, 100);

      return () => clearInterval(fadeOut);
    } else {
      // Play initial music
      initialMusicRef.current?.play();
    }
  }, [isAccepted]);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!isAccepted && initialMusicRef.current) {
      // Adjust playback rate based on hover count
      // Start increasing speed after 3 hovers
      if (hoverCount > 3) {
        const newRate = Math.min(2.0, 1 + (hoverCount - 3) * 0.1);
        initialMusicRef.current.playbackRate = newRate;
      }
    }
  }, [hoverCount, isAccepted]);

  return null; // This is a non-visual component
};

export default AudioController;

================
File: src/constants/index.js
================
export const MESSAGES = [
  'Will you be my Valentine?',
  'Are you sure...? üò¢',
  'Please reconsider! ü•∫',
  "You're breaking my heart! üíî",
  'PLEASE SAY YES! üò≠',
  "DON'T BE LIKE THIS! üò§",
  'SERIOUSLY?! üò†',
  "THAT'S IT! NO MORE MR. NICE GUY! üò°",
  'LAST CHANCE! ü§¨',
  'FINE! KEEP TRYING! I CAN DO THIS ALL DAY! üí¢',
];

export const LDR_QUOTES = [
  'Distance means so little when someone means so much.',
  'I may not be there with you, but my heart always is.',
  'The distance between us is temporary, but our love is permanent.',
  "Missing you is my heart's way of reminding me that I love you.",
  'No distance can weaken what we have, for love knows no boundaries.',
];

================
File: src/animations.css
================
@keyframes float {
  0% {
    transform: translateY(0px);
  }
  50% {
    transform: translateY(-20px);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateY(0px);
  }
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes confetti {
  0% {
    transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg);
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateY(100vh) rotate(720deg);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

@keyframes sparkle {
  0% {
    transform: scale(0) rotate(0deg);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1) rotate(180deg);
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(0) rotate(360deg);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

@keyframes celebration {
  0% {
    transform: scale(0.5);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  50% {
    transform: scale(1.2);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes heartbeat {
  0% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  25% {
    transform: scale(1.1);
  }
  40% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
  60% {
    transform: scale(1.1);
  }
  100% {
    transform: scale(1);
  }
}

@keyframes fadeInSlide {
  0% {
    transform: translateY(20px);
    opacity: 0;
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
  }
}

@keyframes spin-slow {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@keyframes wiggle {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  25% {
    transform: rotate(-5deg);
  }
  75% {
    transform: rotate(5deg);
  }
}

@keyframes shake {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  25% {
    transform: translateX(-10px);
  }
  75% {
    transform: translateX(10px);
  }
}

@keyframes bounce-shake {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: translateY(0) translateX(0);
  }
  25% {
    transform: translateY(-10px) translateX(-10px);
  }
  75% {
    transform: translateY(-10px) translateX(10px);
  }
}

@keyframes rage {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg);
  }
  25% {
    transform: scale(1.1) rotate(-5deg);
  }
  75% {
    transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
  }
}

@keyframes super-rage {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg) translateY(0);
  }
  25% {
    transform: scale(1.2) rotate(-10deg) translateY(-10px);
  }
  75% {
    transform: scale(1.2) rotate(10deg) translateY(-10px);
  }
}

@keyframes ultra-rage {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg) translateY(0) translateX(0);
  }
  25% {
    transform: scale(1.3) rotate(-15deg) translateY(-15px) translateX(-15px);
  }
  75% {
    transform: scale(1.3) rotate(15deg) translateY(-15px) translateX(15px);
  }
}

@keyframes mega-rage {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg) translateY(0);
    filter: hue-rotate(0deg);
  }
  25% {
    transform: scale(1.4) rotate(-20deg) translateY(-20px);
    filter: hue-rotate(90deg);
  }
  75% {
    transform: scale(1.4) rotate(20deg) translateY(-20px);
    filter: hue-rotate(-90deg);
  }
}

@keyframes final-rage {
  0%,
  100% {
    transform: scale(1) rotate(0deg);
    filter: hue-rotate(0deg) brightness(1);
  }
  25% {
    transform: scale(1.5) rotate(-30deg);
    filter: hue-rotate(180deg) brightness(1.5);
  }
  75% {
    transform: scale(1.5) rotate(30deg);
    filter: hue-rotate(-180deg) brightness(1.5);
  }
}

.animate-float {
  animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-fadeIn {
  animation: fadeIn 1s ease-in-out;
}
.animate-confetti {
  animation: confetti 3s ease-out forwards;
}
.animate-sparkle {
  animation: sparkle 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-celebration {
  animation: celebration 1s ease-out;
}
.animate-heartbeat {
  animation: heartbeat 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-fadeInSlide {
  animation: fadeInSlide 1s ease-out forwards;
}
.animate-spin-slow {
  animation: spin-slow 3s linear infinite;
}
.animate-pulse-slow {
  animation: pulse 2s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-wiggle {
  animation: wiggle 0.5s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-shake {
  animation: shake 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-bounce-shake {
  animation: bounce-shake 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-rage {
  animation: rage 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-super-rage {
  animation: super-rage 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-ultra-rage {
  animation: ultra-rage 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-mega-rage {
  animation: mega-rage 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.animate-final-rage {
  animation: final-rage 0.3s ease-in-out infinite;
}

File: src/App.css

#root {
  max-width: 1280px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.logo {
  height: 6em;
  padding: 1.5em;
  will-change: filter;
  transition: filter 300ms;
}
.logo:hover {
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 2em #646cffaa);
}
.logo.react:hover {
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 2em #61dafbaa);
}

@keyframes logo-spin {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference) {
  a:nth-of-type(2) .logo {
    animation: logo-spin infinite 20s linear;
  }
}

.card {
  padding: 2em;
}

.read-the-docs {
  color: #888;
}

================
File: src/App.jsx

import './App.css';
import ValentineProposal from './ValentineProposal';

function App() {
  return (
    <div>
      <ValentineProposal />
    </div>
  );
}

export default App;

import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client';
import './index.css';
import App from './App.jsx';

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <App />
  </StrictMode>
);

================
File: src/repomix-output.txt
================
This file is a merged representation of the entire codebase, combined into a single document by Repomix.

================================================================
File Summary
================================================================

Purpose:
--------
This file contains a packed representation of the entire repository's contents.
It is designed to be easily consumable by AI systems for analysis, code review,
or other automated processes.

File Format:
------------
The content is organized as follows:
1. This summary section
2. Repository information
3. Directory structure
4. Multiple file entries, each consisting of:
  a. A separator line (================)
  b. The file path (File: path/to/file)
  c. Another separator line
  d. The full contents of the file
  e. A blank line

Usage Guidelines:
-----------------
- This file should be treated as read-only. Any changes should be made to the
  original repository files, not this packed version.
- When processing this file, use the file path to distinguish
  between different files in the repository.
- Be aware that this file may contain sensitive information. Handle it with
  the same level of security as you would the original repository.

Notes:
------
- Some files may have been excluded based on .gitignore rules and Repomix's configuration
- Binary files are not included in this packed representation. Please refer to the Repository Structure section for a complete list of file paths, including binary files
- Files matching patterns in .gitignore are excluded
- Files matching default ignore patterns are excluded

Additional Info:
----------------

Directory Structure
================================================================

  react.svg

================
File: App.css

#root {
  max-width: 1280px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.logo {
  height: 6em;
  padding: 1.5em;
  will-change: filter;
  transition: filter 300ms;
}
.logo:hover {
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 2em #646cffaa);
}
.logo.react:hover {
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 2em #61dafbaa);
}

@keyframes logo-spin {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference) {
  a:nth-of-type(2) .logo {
    animation: logo-spin infinite 20s linear;
  }
}

.card {
  padding: 2em;
}

.read-the-docs {
  color: #888;
}

================

import { useState } from 'react';
import reactLogo from './assets/react.svg';
import viteLogo from '/vite.svg';
import './App.css';
import ValentineProposal from './ValentineProposal';

function App() {
  return (
    <div>
      <ValentineProposal />
    </div>
  );
}

export default App;

import { StrictMode } from 'react';
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client';
import './index.css';
import App from './App.jsx';

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <App />
  </StrictMode>
);

================
File: ValentineProposal.jsx
================
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Heart } from 'lucide-react';

const ValentineProposal = () => {
  const [position, setPosition] = useState(null);
  const [isHovering, setIsHovering] = useState(false);
  const [accepted, setAccepted] = useState(false);

  const ldrQuotes = [
    'Distance means so little when someone means so much.',
    'I may not be there with you, but my heart always is.',
    'The distance between us is temporary, but our love is permanent.',
    "Missing you is my heart's way of reminding me that I love you.",
    'No distance can weaken what we have, for love knows no boundaries.',
  ];

  const handleNoHover = () => {
    setIsHovering(true);
    const newX = Math.random() * (window.innerWidth - 100);
    const newY = Math.random() * (window.innerHeight - 100);
    setPosition({ x: newX, y: newY });
  };

  if (accepted) {
    return (
      <div className='min-h-96 w-full flex flex-col items-center justify-center space-y-6 bg-pink-50 p-8'>
        <Heart className='text-red-500 animate-bounce' size={64} />
        <h1 className='text-4xl font-bold text-red-500 text-center'>Yay! Happy Valentine's Day! ‚ù§Ô∏è</h1>
        <div className='max-w-2xl mx-auto'>
          {ldrQuotes.map((quote, index) => (
            <div
              key={index}
              className='text-lg text-gray-700 italic text-center my-4 p-4 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-pink-200'
            >
              "{quote}"
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className='h-96 w-full flex flex-col items-center justify-center space-y-8 bg-pink-50'>
      <h1 className='text-4xl font-bold text-red-500 text-center'>Will you be my Valentine?</h1>
      <div className='flex items-center justify-center space-x-4 relative'>
        <button
          onClick={() => setAccepted(true)}
          className={`bg-green-500 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-bold transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-green-600 ${
            isHovering ? 'scale-125' : 'scale-100'
          }`}
        >
          Yes
        </button>
        <button
          onMouseEnter={handleNoHover}
          className='bg-red-500 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-bold hover:bg-red-600'
          style={
            position
              ? {
                  position: 'absolute',
                  left: position.x,
                  top: position.y,
                  transition: 'all 0.3s ease',
                }
              : undefined
          }
        >
          No
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default ValentineProposal;



================================================================
End of Codebase
================================================================

================
File: src/ValentineProposal.jsx
================
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { Heart, Angry } from 'lucide-react';
import { FloatingHeart } from './components/decorative';
import AcceptedView from './components/AcceptedView';
import { MESSAGES } from './constants';
import './animations.css';

const ValentineProposal = () => {
  const [position, setPosition] = useState(null);
  const [isHovering, setIsHovering] = useState(false);
  const [accepted, setAccepted] = useState(false);
  const [hearts, setHearts] = useState([]);
  const [confetti, setConfetti] = useState([]);
  const [sparkles, setSparkles] = useState([]);
  const [hoverCount, setHoverCount] = useState(0);
  const [message, setMessage] = useState(MESSAGES[0]);
  const [isMuted, setIsMuted] = useState(true);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (accepted) {
      const newConfetti = Array.from({ length: 30 }, (_, i) => ({
        id: i,
        left: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
        top: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
        animationDelay: `${Math.random() * 2}s`,
        animationDuration: `${2 + Math.random() * 3}s`,
      }));
      setConfetti(newConfetti);

      // Create sparkles
      const newSparkles = Array.from({ length: 25 }, (_, i) => ({
        id: i,
        left: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
        top: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
        animationDelay: `${Math.random() * 3}s`,
        animationDuration: `${1 + Math.random() * 2}s`,
      }));
      setSparkles(newSparkles);
    }

    // Create floating hearts
    const newHearts = Array.from({ length: 20 }, (_, i) => ({
      id: i,
      left: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
      top: `${Math.random() * 100}%`,
      animationDelay: `${Math.random() * 5}s`,
      size: 20 + Math.random() * 20,
    }));
    setHearts(newHearts);

    document.body.style.margin = '0';
    document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';

    return () => {
      document.body.style.margin = '';
      document.body.style.overflow = '';
    };
  }, [accepted]);

  const handleNoHover = () => {
    setIsHovering(true);
    setHoverCount(prev => {
      const newCount = prev + 1;
      setMessage(MESSAGES[Math.min(newCount, MESSAGES.length - 1)]);
      return newCount;
    });

    const buttonWidth = 120;
    const buttonHeight = 60;

    const viewportWidth = window.innerWidth;
    const viewportHeight = window.innerHeight;

    const maxX = viewportWidth - buttonWidth - 20;
    const maxY = viewportHeight - buttonHeight - 20;

    // More erratic movement as hover count increases
    const randomMove = () => {
      const intensity = Math.min(hoverCount / 2, 5);
      return (Math.random() - 0.5) * 2 * intensity;
    };

    let newX, newY;
    do {
      newX = Math.max(20, Math.min(maxX, Math.random() * maxX + randomMove() * 50));
      newY = Math.max(20, Math.min(maxY, Math.random() * maxY + randomMove() * 50));
    } while (position && Math.abs(newX - position.x) < 100 && Math.abs(newY - position.y) < 100);

    setPosition({ x: newX, y: newY });
  };

  const getNoButtonClasses = () => {
    const baseClasses = 'text-white px-12 py-6 rounded-xl text-2xl font-bold hover:bg-red-600 fixed';
    const animationClasses = [
      'animate-none',
      'animate-wiggle',
      'animate-bounce',
      'animate-shake',
      'animate-bounce-shake',
      'animate-rage',
      'animate-super-rage',
      'animate-ultra-rage',
      'animate-mega-rage',
      'animate-final-rage',
    ];

    const animationIndex = Math.min(hoverCount, animationClasses.length - 1);
    return `${baseClasses} ${animationClasses[animationIndex]}`;
  };

  if (accepted) {
    return <AcceptedView hearts={hearts} confetti={confetti} sparkles={sparkles} isMuted={isMuted} />;
  }

  return (
    <div className='fixed inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center bg-pink-50 overflow-hidden'>
      {/* Add audio controller */}
      <AudioController hoverCount={hoverCount} isAccepted={accepted} isMuted={isMuted} />

      {/* Sound control button */}
      <button
        onClick={() => setIsMuted(!isMuted)}
        className='fixed top-4 right-4 p-3 rounded-full bg-white/50 hover:bg-white/80 transition-colors z-50'
      >
        {isMuted ? <VolumeX className='text-gray-600 h-6 w-6' /> : <Volume2 className='text-gray-600 h-6 w-6' />}
      </button>

      {hearts.map(heart => (
        <FloatingHeart
          key={heart.id}
          style={{
            left: heart.left,
            top: heart.top,
            animationDelay: heart.animationDelay,
          }}
        />
      ))}

      <h1
        className={`text-6xl font-bold text-red-500 text-center mb-16 px-4 transition-all duration-300 
        ${hoverCount > 5 ? 'animate-shake' : ''}`}
      >
        {message}
      </h1>
      <div className='flex items-center justify-center gap-16 relative'>
        <button
          onClick={() => setAccepted(true)}
          className={`bg-green-500 text-white px-12 py-6 rounded-xl text-2xl font-bold transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-green-600 hover:shadow-lg ${
            isHovering ? 'scale-125' : 'scale-100'
          } ${hoverCount > 3 ? 'animate-pulse' : ''}`}
        >
          Yes
        </button>
        <button
          onMouseEnter={handleNoHover}
          className={`bg-red-500 ${getNoButtonClasses()}`}
          style={
            position
              ? {
                  left: position.x,
                  top: position.y,
                  transition: `all ${Math.max(0.1, 0.3 - hoverCount * 0.02)}s ease`,
                  zIndex: 50,
                }
              : {
                  position: 'relative',
                }
          }
        >
          No
          {hoverCount > 5 && <Angry className='absolute -top-4 -right-4 text-red-600 animate-bounce' />}
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

export default ValentineProposal;

File: eslint.config.js

import js from '@eslint/js'
import globals from 'globals'
import react from 'eslint-plugin-react'
import reactHooks from 'eslint-plugin-react-hooks'
import reactRefresh from 'eslint-plugin-react-refresh'

export default [
  { ignores: ['dist'] },
  {
    files: ['**/*.{js,jsx}'],
    languageOptions: {
      ecmaVersion: 2020,
      globals: globals.browser,
      parserOptions: {
        ecmaVersion: 'latest',
        ecmaFeatures: { jsx: true },
        sourceType: 'module',
      },
    },
    settings: { react: { version: '18.3' } },
    plugins: {
      react,
      'react-hooks': reactHooks,
      'react-refresh': reactRefresh,
    },
    rules: {
      ...js.configs.recommended.rules,
      ...react.configs.recommended.rules,
      ...react.configs['jsx-runtime'].rules,
      ...reactHooks.configs.recommended.rules,
      'react/jsx-no-target-blank': 'off',
      'react-refresh/only-export-components': [
        'warn',
        { allowConstantExport: true },
      ],
    },
  },
]

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/vite.svg" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Vite + React</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="root"></div>
    <script type="module" src="/src/main.jsx"></script>
  </body>
</html>

  "name": "valentine-website",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",

    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "vite build",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "preview": "vite preview"
  },

    "@tailwindcss/vite": "^4.0.6",
    "lucide-react": "^0.475.0",

    "@eslint/js": "^9.19.0",

    "@types/react-dom": "^19.0.3",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.3.4",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.20",

    "vite": "^6.1.0"
  }

================
File: README.md
================
# React + Vite

This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.

Currently, two official plugins are available:

- [@vitejs/plugin-react](https://github.com/vitejs/vite-plugin-react/blob/main/packages/plugin-react/README.md) uses [Babel](https://babeljs.io/) for Fast Refresh
- [@vitejs/plugin-react-swc](https://github.com/vitejs/vite-plugin-react-swc) uses [SWC](https://swc.rs/) for Fast Refresh

================
File: vite.config.js
================
import { defineConfig } from 'vite';
import react from '@vitejs/plugin-react';
import tailwindcss from '@tailwindcss/vite';

// https://vite.dev/config/
export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [react(), tailwindcss()],
  assetsInclude: ['**/*.mp3'],
});



================================================================
End of Codebase
================================================================
